SELECT ((SELECT COUNT(sb.sug_idx) FROM SUG_BOARD sb) - (SELECT COUNT(sa.sug_idx) FROM SUG_ANSWER sa)) AS waiting_suggestions , ((SELECT COUNT(rb.report_idx) FROM REPORT_BOARD rb) - (SELECT COUNT(ah.action_idx) FROM ACTION_HISTORY ah)) AS waiting_report , (SELECT COUNT(u.user_id) FROM USERS u) AS user_count , ((SELECT CASE WHEN (SUM(up.POINT) * 0.05) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE (SUM(up.POINT) * 0.05) END FROM USER_POINT up WHERE up.point_type = '충전') + (SELECT CASE WHEN (SUM(pc.p_cal_amount) - SUM(pc.p_actual_amount)) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE (SUM(pc.p_cal_amount) - SUM(pc.p_actual_amount)) END FROM POINT_CALCULATION pc)) AS profit
